```{r include=FALSE,cache=FALSE}

library(knitr)
library(bookdown)


knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, 
                      collapse = TRUE, 
                      warning = FALSE, 
                      message = FALSE)


source("./crispr_pipeline_report_functions.R")

fig.caption=paste0("Scatter plots depicting log2 fold changes in comparison group ", 1, ".")
```

```{r dev='png', echo=FALSE, fig.show='show',fig.width=8, cache=FALSE, fig.cap=fig.caption}
scatters[[i]]
```
